definition: A journey or trip, typically involving the use of a vehicle or mode of transportation. It is commonly used to refer to a specific instance of traveling, often by car, train, or boat, and can also denote the act of driving or sailing.

examples.german: Ich wünsche dir eine gute Fahrt!
examples.english: I wish you a good trip!

examples.german: Die Fahrt mit dem Fahrrad war sehr angenehm.
examples.english: The bike ride was very pleasant.

examples.german: Die Fahrt mit der U-Bahn war pünktlich.
examples.english: The subway ride was on time.

examples.german: Die Fahrt durch die Berge war atemberaubend.
examples.english: The drive through the mountains was breathtaking.
